name: Mystic Fantasy Horror
description:
How to play: Arrow Keys or WSAD to move, Space to attack. Shift to spawn a new horde. Ctrl to open the shop.

Mobile Controls: On-Screen. Tap to enable!

Mystic Fantasy is a roguelike, wave based beat-em-up where you hack and slash your way through increasingly more difficult waves of enemies. Upgrade weapons and stats on the way to glory and find the loadout that suits you best.

What's New?

1.1.4

- Fixed ninja and shop bugs.

- Updated touch support. Just tap the screen!
